home.title: Casual Chess
home.get-started: Start a game quickly, without registration.
home.description: There are already other great places to play chess on the internet, but they are also complex and loaded with features. Sometimes you just want to play a game with someone you know without having to register anywhere. Casual Chess tries to fill that gap.

newgame-dialog.last-text2: That link is private and only needs to be used by your opponent, as anyone who has access to the link will be able to move the pieces on their behalf.
